title: Why doesn\'t the Star News run an in depth investigation of the Cape Fear Water And Sewer authority, similar to the one run about the ABC board? I think you would find much more waste and corruption here than you did with the ABC board. Just look at the vehicles they drive and the equipment they have and explain how they can justify TWO price increases already this year and it\'s only March???
